PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In contrast , the PCE suddenly decreased in the blended device of P5 and PC61BM ( 3.02% ) and further decreased in P6 ( 2.09% ) , mainly due to the significant decrease of the J SC .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 3.02% |
| 2.09% |
| J SC |

The entities in the paragraph are:

* "3.02%" - the percentage change in the PCE in the blended device of P5 and PC61BM
* "2.09%" - the percentage change in the PCE in P6
* "J SC" - the abbreviation for "joint space coefficient", which is not a valid property value in this context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 3.02% |
| 2.09% |

The entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of a material property are:

* "3.02%" - the percentage change in the PCE in the blended device of P5 and PC61BM
* "2.09%" - the percentage change in the PCE in P6
